title: Acupuncture | Shepherds' Vets Centre Kidderminster
description: Acupuncture services in Kidderminster.We are delighted to be able to offer acupuncture by our resident vet David Beechey BVSc MRCVS
cleaned_text: We are delighted to be able to offer acupuncture by our resident vet David Beechey BVSc MRCVS Acupuncture is the practice of placing fine solid needles in to points on the body to provide pain relief and in some cases to help with other diseases. David performs acupuncture principally to help patients with musculoskeletal pain eg chronic arthritis or muscular discomfort.
